00017 YardDate& YardDate::operator=(const otl_datetime& time)
00018 {
00019     SetYear(time.year);
00020     SetMonth(time.month);
00021     SetDay(time.day);
00022     SetHour(time.hour);
00023     SetMinute(time.minute);
00024     SetSecond(time.second);
00025     SetFraction(time.fraction);

00031 YardDate& YardDate::operator=(const wxDateTime& time)
00032 {
00033     SetYear(time.GetYear());
00034     SetMonth(time.GetMonth() + 1); // wxDateTime month is 0 based enum
00035     SetDay(time.GetDay());
00036     SetHour(time.GetHour());
00037     SetMinute(time.GetMinute());
00038     SetSecond(time.GetSecond());
00039     SetFraction(time.GetMillisecond());
00040     SetFracPrecision(3);
00041     return *this;
00042 }

00047 string YardDate::ToString() const
00048 {
00049     stringstream str;
00050     str << GetYear() << "-" 
00051         << setw(2) << setfill('0') << GetMonth() << "-"
00052         << setw(2) << setfill('0') << GetDay() << " "
00053         << setw(2) << setfill('0') << GetHour() << ":" 
00054         << setw(2) << setfill('0') << GetMinute() << ":" 
00055         << setw(2) << setfill('0') << GetSecond();
00056     return str.str();
00057     
00058 }

00074     str << GetYear() << "-"
